content: The Rat Imperial Guard fight is difficult, not because the foe himself is particularly powerful, but because he has two other Rat Imperial Guards fighting by his side. Rat Imperial Guards are extremely fast and fight with dual-handed scythe-like weapons. Perfect Dodging their swipes will help you out greatly in this battle. It is easy to get overwhelmed in this fight, so try to separate them and pick them off one by one.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Rat_Imperial_Guard_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Rat Imperial Guard Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Rat Imperial Guard Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Rat Imperial Guard fight is difficult, not because the foe himself is particularly powerful, but because he has two other Rat Imperial Guards fighting by his side. Rat Imperial Guards are extremely fast and fight with dual-handed scythe-like weapons. Perfect Dodging their swipes will help you out greatly in this battle. It is easy to get overwhelmed in this fight, so try to separate them and pick them off one by one.
